title: Wh- Questions
description: Слушайте вопросы с what, where, when, who, why, how.

tasks.audioText: I need to find the bank. Where is the nearest bank?

options.text: The person asks about the location of a bank.
The person asks about the time the bank opens.
The person asks who works at the bank.
The person asks why the bank is closed.

tasks.explanation: 'Where' asks about a place or location.

tasks.audioText: The meeting is today. What time does the meeting start?
tasks.transcript: What time does the meeting start?

options.text: The person asks where the meeting is.
The person wants to know when the meeting begins.
The person asks who is at the meeting.
The person asks why there is a meeting.

tasks.explanation: 'What time' asks about the specific time something happens.

tasks.audioText: Someone called me. Who called you this morning?

options.text: The person asks what time the call was.
The person asks where the call came from.
The person asks about the caller's identity.
The person asks how many calls there were.

tasks.audioText: You look upset today. Why are you sad?

options.text: The person asks when you became sad.
The person asks where you feel sad.
The person asks about the reason for being sad.
The person asks who made you happy.

tasks.explanation: 'Why' asks about the reason for something.

tasks.audioText: I want to make a cake. How do you make a chocolate cake?
tasks.transcript: How do you make a chocolate cake?

options.text: The person asks what a chocolate cake is.
The person asks where to buy a cake.
The person asks about the method of making a cake.
The person asks who made the cake.

tasks.explanation: 'How' asks about the way or method of doing something.

tasks.audioText: Your birthday is coming soon. When is your birthday?

options.text: The person asks where the party will be.
The person asks what gift you want.
The person asks about the date of the birthday.
The person asks who is coming to the party.

tasks.explanation: 'When' asks about the time or date of something.

tasks.audioText: You are reading something interesting. What are you reading?

options.text: The person asks why you are reading.
The person asks where you are reading.
The person asks when you started reading.
The person asks about the book or text you are reading.

tasks.explanation: 'What' asks about a thing or an object.

tasks.audioText: I see you have a new car. How much did it cost?

options.text: The person asks where you bought the car.
The person asks what color the car is.
The person asks about the price of the car.
The person asks who sold the car.

tasks.explanation: 'How much' asks about the price or amount of something.

tasks.audioText: You were on holiday last week. Where did you go on holiday?
tasks.transcript: Where did you go on holiday?

options.text: The person asks when the holiday was.
The person asks why you went on holiday.
The person asks about the holiday destination.
The person asks who went with you.

tasks.explanation: 'Where did you go' asks about the place or destination.

tasks.audioText: There are many people here. How many people are at the party?
tasks.transcript: How many people are at the party?

options.text: The person asks about the number of people.
The person asks who organised the party.
The person asks where the party is.
The person asks what food is at the party.

tasks.explanation: 'How many' asks about the number or quantity of something.

tasks.audioText: You changed your job. Why did you leave your old job?
tasks.transcript: Why did you leave your old job?

options.text: The person asks what the new job is.
The person asks about the reason for leaving.
The person asks when you left.
The person asks where the old job was.

tasks.explanation: 'Why did you leave' asks about the reason for the action.

tasks.audioText: You speak English well. How long have you studied English?
tasks.transcript: How long have you studied English?

options.text: The person asks about the duration of studying.
The person asks where you study English.
The person asks who teaches you English.
The person asks what language you speak.

tasks.explanation: 'How long' asks about the length of time.

tasks.audioText: There is a strange noise outside. What is that noise?

options.text: The person asks where the noise is coming from.
The person wants to know what is making the sound.
The person asks when the noise started.
The person asks who is making noise.

tasks.explanation: 'What is that' asks about the identity of something.

tasks.audioText: I need to talk to the manager. Who is the manager here?

options.text: The person asks what the manager does.
The person asks when the manager arrives.
The person wants to know which person is the manager.
The person asks where the manager's office is.

tasks.explanation: 'Who is' asks about the identity of a person.

tasks.audioText: I see you are going somewhere. Where are you going now?

options.text: The person asks why you are leaving.
The person asks about your destination.
The person asks when you are coming back.
The person asks who is going with you.

tasks.explanation: 'Where are you going' asks about the place you are heading to.
